divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I went to town to get an ice cream, on our way back around 9pm, I noticed something above the tree line, pulled over on a side road to watch it and when a flash of lightning you could make out a triangular shaped craft, that just seemed to be floating along, there were no marker lights we got back into the car and left, wasn't sure what it was the lights looked headlights on a car, then I thought I ain't no car, and its moving to slow for a plane or helicopter
trends: There have been no other sightings in Draffenville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Noticed 2 lights above tree line on Hwy 68
